title: Vinicius Lima
text:
I’m a post-doctoral researcher at Insper in São Paulo, Brazil.
My main research project currently examines the potential effects of a policy intended to reduce domestic violence on women’s labor market outcomes. This research in financed by the São Paulo Research Foundation (FAPESP).
I have a broad interest in topics of development economics with a focus on education, labor, and political economy.
CV.
My email address is vinicius.gomes.lima [at] alumni.usp.br.
